short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are a reviewer of a pull request, help us do a review on Git Hub. Very useful for both reviewers and developers!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is for engineers.One of the jobs of an engineer is CodeReview.When reviewing code, we need to properly communicate the review content to the reviewee.This extension allows you to do two main things One is to generate LGTM images, which must be written in a special format in order to put them on GitHub. Therefore, copying LGTM images from other sites is very time consuming. However, without images, it would be very bleak. This extension solves that.Second, a review batch can be quickly posted to clearly communicate the intent of the review to the implementer. This allows for quick and accurate codereview.The two uses are quite simple. Just you can fix this extension and solve it by pressing that button. If you need help, we have a help page with English text.
